definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Decisions are made by consensus at the weekly meeting.
sentences.chinese: 决议通过周会的共识产生。
我在这周会打电话给你。

sentences.english: Communicate regularly with outlet managers and conduct effective daily briefings and weekly meetings.
sentences.chinese: 和餐饮部部门经理保持有效的沟通，组织例会和周会。

sentences.english: Shall we assign Thursday for our weekly meetings?
sentences.chinese: 把星期四定为我们的周会日好吗？

sentences.english: The candidates will continue to keep up the pressure, crisscrossing battleground states this week.
sentences.chinese: 两位候选人这周会继续保持压力，在主要州穿梭。

sentences.english: But this week has a couple of barriers which irk you a bit.
sentences.chinese: 但这周会有一些障碍会使你有一点烦恼。

sentences.english: I think we’ll do more this week since it actually went okay.
sentences.chinese: 我想，等弄好了以后我们这周会多做一点的。

sentences.english: Well, what about this Thursday evening after we finish the weekly meeting?
sentences.chinese: 额，这个星期二晚上，我们开完周会之后怎么样。

definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
one week/all the way around/a whole cycle
